title: MR.SIGA Microfibre Cleaning Cloth, All-Purpose Surface Microfibre Towel, Streak Free Reusable Kitchen Towel for Kitchen, House,Bathrooms, Car, Pack of 12, Sky Blue, 32 x 32 cm(12.6 x 12.6 inch)…
features: MADE OF ULTRA SOFT AND SCRATCH FREE MATERIAL: Ultra soft and highly absorbent microfibre cloth, great for cleaning windows, kitchenware, car or other delicate surfaces.

ABSORBENT AND LINT FREE MICROFIBRE TOWEL: These non-abrasive kitchen towel can soak up water from the countertop and tables instantly and without lint or streaks left behind. Clean with or without water, from worktops, appliances to kitchens, bathrooms, mirrors etc, they will make your house sparkling.

TACKLE VERSATILE CLEANING JOBS: These premium cleaning cloths are also perfect dish rags which don't smell, removes grease and particles from microwave oven, plates, pots or pans effortlessly. Not only that, you will be amazed they are also terrific duster that removes fingertips from silverware and glasses easily and leaves your kitchen spotless.

REUSABLE AND LONG LASTING: These microfibre cleaning cloth feature high quality stitching with reinforced edges, they are durable and made to last hundreds of washings. They are lightweight, super absorbent, you can use the dish cloths everyday for housekeeping.
MR.SIGA's mission: Make your housework easier, and make the world cleaner. Should you have any questions about the product, please do not hesitate to contact us. We are here for support and advice!
description: Product Description Previous page MR.SIGA Microfibre Cleaning Cloth Can be used in kitchen countertops, range hoods, dishes, coffee machines MR.SIGA Microfibre Cleaning Cloth Cleaning cloth can wipe the surface of leather sofa, wooden furniture, decorative objects MR.SIGA Microfiber Cleaning Cloth MR.SIGA cleaning cloth can clean the inside surface of the car and the outside dust Next page 1 KITCHEN 2 LIVING ROOM 3 AUTOMOBILE SOFT CLOTH Made of 87% Polyester and 13% Polyamide, which are soft to touch and lint-free. SCRATCH FREE MR.SIGA microfiber cleaning cloth will not scratch or damage any finishes. It can clean the screen surface, plate surface oil, dust and so on HIGHLY ABSORBENT Cleaning cloth is more absorbent than cotton material, can quickly absorb surface moisture, bring convenience to your life MACHINE WASHABLE MR.SIGA microfiber cleaning cloth can be washed in the washing machine, free your hands, and can be reused for a long time Why choose MR.SIGA? Choose MR.SIGA for top-quality, eco-conscious cleaning solutions, designed to enhance your cleaning experience. Our versatile, stylish products ensure exceptional results, making cleaning efficient and enjoyable! What is a microfiber cleaning cloth? A microfiber cleaning cloth is a type of cloth made from very fine fibers that are tightly woven together to create a highly absorbent and durable material. What are microfiber cleaning cloths used for? Microfiber cleaning cloths are commonly used for cleaning a wide variety of surfaces, including kitchen, furniture, car, and other smooth surfaces. They can be used dry to dust and polish or dampened with water or clean surfaces. How do you clean and maintain microfiber cleaning cloths? Can be washed by hand or in a washing machine using mild detergent and warm water. It's important to avoid using fabric softener or bleach as these can damage the microfiber material. After washing, hang or lay flat to air dry. Are microfiber cleaning cloths better than traditional cleaning cloths? Microfiber cleaning cloths are highly effective at picking up dirt and debris, and require less cleaning solution than traditional cleaning cloths. They are also more durable and generally last longer than traditional cloths. It can be reused.
